description: Dashboard providing detailed overview of InfluxDB instance performance, including configuration stats, Go runtime performance, query/request load, and task scheduler activity.

panels.description: Time that the InfluxDB process has been running.
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Number of buckets on the server.
panels.title: Buckets

panels.description: Total number of users for the server.
panels.title: Users

panels.description: Number of replication configurations on the server.
panels.title: Replications

panels.description: Number of remote connections configured on the server.
panels.title: Remotes

panels.description: Number of scrapers on the server.
panels.title: Scrapers

panels.description: Number of dashboards on the server.
panels.title: Dashboards

panels.description: Number of threads currenty active on the server.
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: Rate of HTTP API requests to the API, organized by response code.
panels.title: HTTP API requests

panels.description: Number of queries compiling, queuing, and executing on this instance.
panels.title: Active queries

panels.description: Rate of HTTP query and write operations handled by this instance.
panels.title: HTTP operations

panels.description: Bytes per second for HTTP query and write request/response bodies.
panels.title: HTTP operation data

panels.description: Rate of InfluxQL queries executed by this instance.
panels.title: IQL query rate

panels.description: Total time spent executing InfluxQL queries during each $__interval.
panels.title: IQL response time / $__interval

panels.description: Rate of reads and writes to the underlying BoltDB storage engine for the server.
panels.title: BoltDB operations

panels.description: Number of tasks currently being executed for the server.
panels.title: Active tasks

panels.description: Number of workers currently running tasks on the server.
panels.title: Active workers

panels.description: Percentage of available workers that are currently busy.
panels.title: Worker usage

panels.description: Rate of executions and execution failures for the server.
panels.title: Executions

panels.description: Rate of schedule operations and schedule operation failures for the server.
panels.title: Schedules

panels.description: Amount of time since the last garbage collection cycle.
panels.title: Time since last GC

panels.description: Server CPU time spent on garbage collection.
panels.title: GC time

panels.description: Percent of server CPU time used for garbage collection.
panels.title: GC CPU usage

panels.description: Heap memory usage for the server.
panels.title: Heap memory usage

panels.description: Number of OS threads created for the server.
panels.title: Threads

title: InfluxDB instance overview
